description: Folsom Lake College (including El Dorado Center and Rancho Cordova Center) will be closed for Winter Recess Friday, December 23 - Monday, January 2. Most college offices will re-open on Tuesday, January 3, 2017.The Spring 2017 semester officially begins on January 14 with most Spring classes meeting for the first time January 17-23. Students can register online during the break here. To check out the class schedule, click here.
title: Closed for Winter Recess (thru 1/2)
